moves.1... d5: I like this more than e5.
moves.2. e3 e6 3. Nc3 c5: I was trying to apply pressure on d4.
moves.4. Nf3 Nc6 5. g3 f6 6. Bb5: I should have seen this coming. It ruins my d5 attack.
moves.12. Re1 Ne5: Guarding against a loss in the case of Nxe7.
moves.14. Qd5+ Kh8 15. Nxe5 fxe5 16. Rxe5: My Bishops now will rip open the King.
moves.25... Qg1+ 26. Kh3 Qh1#: Thank you, turin25, for this great game, and thank you all for reading.
